TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit TextFragment extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含語音合成器引擎所使用的文字和語音屬性資訊。

span.span: Contains text and speech attribute information for consumption by a speech synthsizer engine.

summary.span: 建構 的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式。Default constructor for .

summary.span: 取得或設定 的語音屬性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets speech attribute information for a .

value.span: 執行個體會傳回，或用來設定的語音屬性資訊。

span.span: A instance is returned, or used to set speech attribute information for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性的預設值為 `null`。The default value of this property is `null`. 可以從執行個體取得 prosody 資訊傳回屬性的執行個體上傳回。Prosody information can be obtained from the instance of returned by the property on the instance of returned by .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int TextLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定片段中語音文字的長度。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of the speech text in the fragment.

value.span: 會傳回，也可以用來設定和要說出的這個片段相關聯的文字字串的長度（以字元為單位）。

span.span: An is returned or can be used to set the length, in character, of the text string associated with this fragment to be spoken.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int TextOffset { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定片段中文字起始的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the starting location of the text in the fragment.

value.span: 會傳回，也可以用來設定和要說出的這個片段相關聯的該文字字串部分的開始位置（以字元為單位）。

span.span: An is returned or can be used to set the start location, in character, of the part of text string associated with this fragment to be spoken.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TextToSpeak { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 設定或取得片段的語音文字。

span.span: Sets or gets the speech text of the fragment.

value.span: 會傳回，或者可以用來設定語音合成引擎所要使用的語音文字以產生音訊輸出。

span.span: A is returned or can be used to set the speech text to be used by a speech synthesis engine to generate audio output.
